reviews.content: This is quite nice, adds a much smoother app drawer! Highly recommend!
Hidden oaks are shown once you toggle wiggle mode
I use it to store games and it works great. ; 12.0.1
It works but if you hide the apps on the homescreen then all of your apps will be randomly put on the screen when you uninstall or disable the tweak.

Works great ! 
(Reviewed by @iTollMouS XS Max owner )

Very buggy. There’s multiple parts that bugs out so I won’t get into specifics. It’s unusable though so I had to remove it as sometimes it forces me to respring because the view stays on top of everything.
